author: Al Peacock
comment: Looks great
title: Pretty cool

author: Austin Hider
comment: I like the color schemes too
title: Simple

author: mujahid mulla
comment: The wast of money it's simple and no more colour sating

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Which color do you like to set?
We welcome your suggestion.For more question,please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: This kind of face we can get free

author: Jon Clark
comment: What is it about this particular watchface that (apparently) requires the flicker from black and white to the actual (cool looking) watch face. I have a bunch of watchfaces from this dev and they don't do this. Just this one and one other one, the A41 for Moto 360 watchface. Considering a person mostly only looks at their watch for a fraction of a second, the actual non b&w version rarely gets seen.
title: Why does it start off in black and White mode!!?

author: Ben Clendenon
comment: Don't like that it turns black and white when going to sleep.

author: Krishna Kumar
comment: Great face

author: Thomas Montaghami
comment: It's got some nice colors but it doesn't let you customize the colors of different parts of your display much as I would like it to.
title: Nice looking colors

author: Victor Miranda
comment: I just bought your F01 watchable and it comes with enable drawing for ambient mode setting. Can you enable this setting on this watchface.  Thanks
title: Beautiful Watchface

author: Naylor Fitzhugh III
comment: I didn't get a response email about the fact that it flickers from black and white to color every time it goes on and off. This is unfortunate and looks cheap when you are trying to show off your watch. Hope it gets a fix
title: Almost great

author: Bryan Sloan
comment: Much better on battery now!  Great watch faces!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Today,I've done big update for the battery it's life can be extended.
Would you please check and install the latest version of the app.
Thank you.

author: Charlie Rappa
comment: Moto 360 black bar cuts off circle. Since the 360 is the only round wear device at this time this should be redesigned to accommodate.
title: Need to move outer circle to compensate for 360

author: Michael Nicolaides
comment: Good looking watch face but no 24hr format is a deal breaker for me.  I see you have the option on most of your other faces.  Any chance you can add it here too?
title: Good watchface

author: Montu Timbalia
comment: Nice color but, can't really read the time if there is a message, would like the ability to move the layout a little.
title: Like it but...

author: Jay S
comment: Looks nice.  But battery life drains very quickly.  From 100% to 50% in almost 2hrs

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Today,I've done big update for the battery it's life can be extended.
Would you please check and install the latest version of the app.
Thank you.

title: Nice but drains battery quick

author: Jason Wilkins
comment: I would like the ability to disable the dimmed mode, as I always disable ambient mode. Otherwise, fantastic.
title: Gorgeous face

author: John Tobias
comment: Great watch face,  very easy to read at a glance.   5*
title: Casio style

author: Brandon Owens
comment: I love this face, shows all the information I want at all times. My only two issues is the "%" symbol is the wrong font/size and doesn't render correctly and you can't change the orange color (as far as I can tell). Other than those two things it's awesome!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
I've updated the app.Would you please check.

Update followings
- '%' display changed to fit the layout
- Add digits color option
 You can select 'ORANGE' and 'RED'

title: Great face!

author: Brian Rice
comment: This face is one of the nicest digital ones I've seen, however, battery life suffers greatly. I had the watch off the charger for half a day and it only dropped to 78%. Once I put this face on it the battery dipped all the way to 47% in a matter of 2 hours.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Today,I've done big update for the battery it's life can be extended.
Would you please check and install the latest version of the app.
Thank you.

comment: Its a cool watch face but the battery is destroyed!

title: Battery drain

author: Dale Meyer
comment: Love the watch face but it shows the dimmed face before it shows the normal face every time I wake it up. Even if I have dim mode off.
title: Dim

comment: I want a refund, never been able to use it ever!!!
